CustomField.description: For amendments/renewals, the difference between the Initial ARR value (from the source Quote Line) and this line’s own ARR. The basis for a new or separate sale is $0 b/c there is no “source” Quote Line. Can be a negative number (reduction/cancellation).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: For amendments/renewals, the difference between the Initial ARR value (from the source Quote Line) and this line’s own ARR. The basis for a new or separate sale is $0 b/c there is no “source” Quote Line. Can be a negative number (reduction/cancellation).
CustomField.label: ARR Growth
